text: The fund shall consist of, but not be limited to, monies from the following sources:
historical:

Legislative History of Laws

DC CODE ยง 42-2203

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Grants and gifts from public or private sources to the fund or to the District for the purposes of the fund;
Repayments on principal and any interest on loans provided from the fund;
Proceeds realized from the liquidation of any security interests held by the District under the terms of any assistance provided from the fund;
Interest earned from the deposit or investment of monies of the fund;
Monies appropriated for the fund by the United States government; and
All other revenues, receipts, and fees derived from the operation of the fund.

chapter.text: Senior Citizens' Home Repair and Improvement Program Fund.
